entities.name: CONCERT
entities.description: A concert is an event where people gather to listen to music, often creating a sense of unity and connection

entities.name: PARTY
entities.description: A party is a social gathering where music is often played, enhancing the atmosphere and social bonds

entities.name: CLASSICAL MUSIC
entities.description: Classical music is a genre known for its elegance, sophistication, and relaxation

entities.name: ROCK MUSIC
entities.description: Rock music is a genre known for its energy, rebellion, and intensity

entities.name: POP MUSIC
entities.description: Pop music is a popular genre that often evokes feelings of happiness and energy

entities.name: JAZZ MUSIC
entities.description: Jazz music is a genre known for its improvisation and complex rhythms, often associated with relaxation and sophistication

entities.name: ELECTRONIC MUSIC
entities.description: Electronic music is a genre characterized by electronic sounds and beats, often used in dance and club settings

relations: Music is performed at concerts, creating a shared emotional experience among listeners
Music is played at parties, enhancing the social atmosphere and connections among attendees
Classical music is a genre of music that can evoke feelings of elegance and relaxation
Rock music is a genre of music that can evoke feelings of energy and rebellion
Pop music is a genre of music that can evoke feelings of happiness and energy
Jazz music is a genre of music that can evoke feelings of relaxation and sophistication
Electronic music is a genre of music that is often used in dance and club settings, evoking feelings of excitement and energy
